section.title: Strings in p-fields
section.para:
You can pass a string as a p-field instead of a number, like this:
i 1 0 10 "A4"
The string can be received by the instrument and further processed using the string opcodes.

note.para: Currently only one p-field can contain a string (i.e. no more than one string per line is allowed). You can overcome this using strset and strget.
